module.name: part_feature_grouping
module.keywords: module, array, vector, feature, link, piece part, part terminal

abstract.li: the grouping of part features placed explicitly;
the grouping of part features in a linear vector;
the grouping of part features in a rectangular array.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information to support grouping of part features either in a regular array or in a random pattern.
This second edition of this part of ISO 10303 incorporates the modifications to the first edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been modified:
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been added:
In addition, modifications have been made to the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.

inscope.li: grouping of part features placed explicitly;
grouping of part features in a linear vector;
grouping of part features in a rectangular array;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit usage view, ISO/TS 10303-1732.
